hive_text_custom.text: The long term refers to a long period of time. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples:
If you buy a house, it will increase in value in the long term
 In the long term, it is best to have a college degree.

hive_text_custom.text: It will be easier to find accommodation in June.
Accommodation refers to places people stay while traveling.

hive_vocab.examples: The town has lots of accommodation because there are many hotels.When traveling, the biggest cost is usually accommodation.

hive_text_custom.text: You can have an authentic Portuguese experience.
When something is authentic, it is natural and not a copy of something.

hive_vocab.examples: They serve authentic Italian pizza, not the fake American style you usually get.We want the authentic document, not a copy.

hive_text_custom.text: How much should I budget for that?
When you budget for something, you plan how much money you will spend. Notice the following:

hive_vocab.examples: I don't budget, so I am always wasting money.For your trip, please budget for extra costs.

hive_text_custom.text: I can invite my colleagues along.
'Along' means to go in the same direction. We often use it to show some will join us to a destination. Notice the following:
